Squizzy::

She looked at the console, "Thank you Dark One." She saw the windows 
were still dark. She was starting to think like her old self, 
scientific curoisity.  She looked at the console of the ship and 
tried to study it, despite the pain in her shoulder.  She knew that 
all space or flying craft had an eject button, she just had to find 
it.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Dark One is well away from the battle, Dcoburn.
> 
> ::DevilDuer/The Oblitercons::
> 
> DevilDuer yells as shots hit his side, the Alliance member diving 
down and 
> rollinig onthe ground. He jumps up, growling at the bot that had 
shot him.
> 
> "I'm warning you, Maximal. If your troops don't get the pit off our 
territory 
> right now, the Alliance is going to attack the Ark, and crush your 
puny 
> faction."
> 
> He fires a few shots at Astral.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shot barely hits Breakdown, the HUMVEE spinning around, aiming 
all three 
> machine guns at Starlight and firing.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing a bot coming toward him, Pyro transforms into beast mode, 
firing at 
> Griplash.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hiss jumps out of the way, a shot hitting Scavanger.
> 
> His flies into the air, firing rapidly at Fenox while Scavanger 
transforms 
> into artillery mode, firing at all the airborne Lavacons.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "My name's Dark One," Dark One replies, speeding toward the base. 
He could 
> now see it.
> 
> Soon, he'd be able to drop this femm off and return to the 
battle....
